english.segment1: I remember the cold December. I remember the star-crossed sky. I remember how the morning came up singing. And it found two dreamers hanging on tonight
english.segment2: I remember walking in the ocean. I remember that look in your eyes. I remember the way you stood beside me. When the waves were trying to take you with the tide
english.segment3: Chorus: I will remember you. And hold on tight through the years. To each moment when we were together. Every time you were here
english.segment4: I remember the light in the canyon. I remember when the rain came down. I remember the light from the candle that was burning for a long long time
english.segment6: Morning sun midnight chill. Some times you are with me still. All the memories bring you back to me
